job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>Title: DBA / Data Scientist</p><p>Location: Remote (EST)</p><p>W2 only, C2C not eligible</p><p><br></p><p>Overview: Seeking someone with experience in: Regression modeling, Machine leaning (Text analytics nice to have), Python and / or R, and Tableau (nice to have).</p><p><br></p><p> Ideal Qualifications:</p><p>Data Science and Machine Learning Experience –</p><p>Needs to manipulate data and building Models</p><p>Python and/or R experience(someone with only SAS will not be a fit)</p><p>Regression Modeling</p><p>VBA development</p><p>Database – Oracle(preferred)</p><p>Data warehousing (Snowflake Preferred)</p><p>Text Analytics Experience – NLP (Natural Language Processing)</p><p>ODBC</p><p>SQL server&nbsp;</p><p>ETL</p><p>Tableau is nice to have</p><p>Excel is also preferred</p>
